stimulusHtml: The portrayal of Akhenaton and Nefertiti would have been viewed in its original cultural context as unconventional by its ancient Egyptian audience because it shows

choicesHtml: a royal couple depicted as rulers in the afterlife
an Egyptian queen alongside her husband, the pharaoh
the pharaoh and his family worshiping the gods
the pharaoh and his family in an affectionate scene
